pages.text: With a $(l:fabricator)Fabricator$(/l) and a $(l:reactionchamber)Reaction Chamber$(/l) you have access to new high-tech weapons and armors.

pages.title: Advanced Processing
pages.text: The reaction chamber can process titanium ore needed for tier 3 armors. Also it is possible to enrich uranium for nuclear weapons. The fabricator produces energy cells and other items needed.

pages.title: The Power of Flight
pages.text: If you acquire a nether star you can craft the 'anti-gravity device' allowing you to use creative flight when worn.
